    #include<iostream>
    #include<cmath>
    using namespace std;
     
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    long long int n;
    double ans;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>n;
    if(n==2) {cout<<"15\n";continue;}
    ans = 1-n;
    ans += pow((double)n, (double)n+1);
    printf("%.0f\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
    }
